com.ashwin.fri.pacman.actor

Class PacMan

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ashwin.fri.pacman.actor.Actor
      • com.ashwin.fri.pacman.actor.PacMan
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PacManAi, PacManHuman

    public abstract class PacMan
extends Actor
    PacMan is the main character in the classic game PacMan. PacMan can move just like other Actors, but also has an energized state in which it can consume ghosts. PacMan can earn also points as he consumes food, ghosts and energizers.
    Author:
    ashwin

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public boolean move(java.util.List<Actor> actors,
           Grid grid)
        Description copied from class: Actor
        Moves the actor to its next location in the grid. The next position is specified by the getNextPosition method. The method returns true if the actor's position was changed by the move and false otherwise.
        Overrides:
        move in class Actor
        Returns:
        whether or not the actor could move

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Overrides:
        reset in class Actor

      • getPoints

        public int getPoints()
        Returns the number of points that the PacMan has collected so far.
        Returns:
        score

      • consume

        public boolean consume(Ghost ghost)
        Attempts to consume the ghost. Returns false if consumption was unsuccessful (PacMan was eaten by the ghosts) and true otherwise (PacMan ate the ghosts or nobody ate anyone).
        Parameters:
        ghost -
        Returns:
        whether or not PacMan successfully consumed the ghost

      • isEnergized

        public boolean isEnergized()
        Returns whether or not PacMan is in an energized state or not. In the energized state he can consume ghosts for extra points.
        Returns:
        whether or not PacMan is in the energized state

      • setEnergized

        public void setEnergized(boolean isEnergized)
